post.body: I know what ur talking about-u said it right though, "Be okay w/being by yourself FIRST." I see u locked ur acct, boss watching?
me too.
Got your new ride! Where's the photo?!
I love reality shows so I'm all over that one if it's true. hehee :)
Crossword puzzle turned out great - I like that you can do it online and/or print it... great job, have a Happy New Year!
Switched from MindMeister to FreeMind because it's open-source & has more features- http://tinyurl.com/a4u4ma *Make sure u have JavaRuntime.
Looks like I may be off to bed at a decent time 2night, it's only 1:45AM - hopefully I won't wake up too early then, lazy sunday!
Setting up my budget for 2009 w/ Cash Organizer Windows Mobile. I've been using it 3 years now! http://tinyurl.com/78ap7n (give it a sec)
really poor English conversion on this packaging! http://twitpic.com/z7hn
Near Portage Michigan US (42.225 -85.600) http://tinyurl.com/8xndbp
is at home http://tinyurl.com/7d32f8
http://twitpic.com/z6cn - Small part of my mindmap for 2009.
is mind mapping his 2009 http://www.imindmap.com
Just started using http://twply.com/ to get my @replies via email. Neat stuff!
Today officially marks the 9th year of me living in one residence. Wow.
I am posting this tweet via twoogie.com which lets one enter said tweet in the "Doogie" style interface... quite nice I must say! :)
Start '09 w/ your $ under control, track ur spending w/ ur phone's browser http://onlinecheckregister.com I use it & it works great!
is ready to start 2009... but 1st, off to bed it's after 4AM.
Want to go to a place where it's ILLEGAL for people being annoying? Visit Brighton Michigan after Jan 2nd 2009 http://tinyurl.com/ax2wd7
|11:30AM|facebook>twitter>shower>lunch>errands>family dinner>friends visiting|8PM|.
